column4: Was it a bad idea to use dd to write an Ubuntu .iso to my flash drive?
depends which iso, a few only boot this way,if that was the question

The standard 10.10 x86 iso. Anyway, as I said, I seem to have lost the ability to use this flash drive. Gparted reports that it's all unallocated space but I can't create partitions or partition tables
and if it was sdb, stick with it ;-)
